full_summary:
*************************

### Government Tender Announcement

### Title
W0501-24M029 - RC Token Highway Tractors

### Announcement Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites the submission of a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) application to provide highway tractors to the Department of National Defence's Technical Services Transportation Company at the 5 Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick.

### Notice Details
*   Reference Number: WS4317150474
*   Solicitation Number: WS4317150474
*   Publication Date: December 22, 2023
*   Closing Date: January 19, 2024, at 02:00:00 PM EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

### Contract Description
This procurement is for a Regional Individual Standing Offer to rent highway tractors as per the attached Statement of Requirement. Deliveries will be made to the 5 CDSB Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick. **The requirement is for two years with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods.**

### Contract Information
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   End User Entity Name: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   End User Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Trade Agreements
This tender notice is open to contractors that are subcontracted through the following trade agreements:
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
